title: ICE cross compiling in decode_inlined_item

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```
env RUST_BACKTRACE=1 rustc src/lib.rs --crate-name openssl --crate-type lib -g -C metadata=9a870f8b21466322 -C extra-filename=-9a870f8b21466322 --out-dir /home/sfackler/rust/rust-openssl/target/i686-unknown-linux-gnu --dep-info /home/sfackler/rust/rust-openssl/target/i686-unknown-linux-gnu/.fingerprint/openssl-9a870f8b21466322/dep-lib-openssl --target i686-unknown-linux-gnu -L /home/sfackler/rust/rust-openssl/target/i686-unknown-linux-gnu -L /home/sfackler/rust/rust-openssl/target/i686-unknown-linux-gnu/deps
error: internal compiler error: unexpected failure
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
```
